PersistenceService<T,PK>
@Repository
public class PersistenceServiceProvider<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistenceService<T,PK>

方法详细信息

persist

public T persist(T objectToSave)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Make an objectToSave instance managed and persistent. Throws: EntityExistsException - if the entity already exists. (The EntityExistsException may be thrown when the persist operation is invoked, or the EntityExistsException or another PersistenceException may be thrown at flush or commit time.) IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. IllegalArgumentException - if not an entity TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction. Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 persist
返回：
objectToSave

batchPersist

public void batchPersist(java.util.List objectsToSave)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Make an objectsToSave(batch) instance managed and persistent. Throws: EntityExistsException - if the entity already exists. (The EntityExistsException may be thrown when the persist operation is invoked, or the EntityExistsException or another PersistenceException may be thrown at flush or commit time.) IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. IllegalArgumentException - if not an entity TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction. Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 batchPersist

merge

public T merge(T objectToMerge)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Merge the state of the given entity into the current persistence context. Throws: IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. IllegalArgumentException - if instance is not an entity or is a removed entity. TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction. Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 merge
返回：
objectToMerge - the instance that the state was merged to

batchMerge

public void batchMerge(java.util.List objectsToMerge)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Merge(Batch) the state of the given entitys into the current persistence context. Throws: IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. IllegalArgumentException - if instance is not an entity or is a removed entity. TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction. Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 batchMerge

refresh

public void refresh(T objectToRefresh)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Refresh the state of the instance from the database, overwriting changes made to the entity, if any. Throws: IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. IllegalArgumentException - if not an entity or entity is not managed. TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction. EntityNotFoundException - if the entity no longer exists in the database. Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 refresh

remove

public void remove(T objectToRemove)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Remove the entity instance. Throws: IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. IllegalArgumentException - if not an entity or if a detached entity TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction. Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 remove

remove

public void remove(java.lang.Class<T> entityClass,
                   PK id)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
1) Find entity by Object's PK. 2) Remove the entity instance. Throws: IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. IllegalArgumentException - if not an entity or if a detached entity - if the first argument does not denote an entity type or the second argument is not a valid type for that entity's primary key TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction. Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：

flush

public void flush()
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Synchronize the persistence context to the underlying database. Throws: IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. TransactionRequiredException - if there is no transaction PersistenceException - if the flush fails Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 flush

clear

public void clear()
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Clear the persistence context, causing all managed entities to become detached. Changes made to entities that have not been flushed to the database will not be persisted. Throws: IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 clear

contains

public boolean contains(T entity)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Check if the instance belongs to the current persistence context. Throws: IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. IllegalArgumentException - if not an entity Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：

boolean

Throws: IllegalArgumentException - if a query has not been defined with the given name IllegalStateException - if this EntityManager has been closed. - if called for a Java Persistence query language SELECT statement TransactionRequiredException - if there is no transaction Note: All exceptions Will be converted to DataAccessException's subclass and thow

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 updateOrDelByNamedOfQuery

findListBySqlMap

public java.util.List findListBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                                       java.lang.Object parameterObject)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement. Throws: java.sql.SQLException

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 findListBySqlMap
参数：
sqlMapId - -The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - -The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
返回：
A List of result objects.

findMapBySqlMap

public java.util.Map findMapBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                                     java.lang.Object parameterObject,
                                     java.lang.String key)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects that will be keyed into a Map.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement. Throws: java.sql.SQLException

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 findMapBySqlMap
参数：
sqlMapId - The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
key - The property to be used as the key in the Map.
返回：
A Map keyed by keyProp with values being the result object instance.

findMapBySqlMap

public java.util.Map findMapBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                                     java.lang.Object parameterObject,
                                     java.lang.String key,
                                     java.lang.String value)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects from which one property will be keyed into a Map.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement. Throws: java.sql.SQLException

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 findMapBySqlMap
参数：
sqlMapId - -The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - -The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
key - -The property to be used as the key in the Map.
value - -The property to be used as the value in the Map.
返回：
A Map keyed by keyProp with values of valueProp.

findObjectBySqlMap

public java.lang.Object findObjectBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                                           java.lang.Object parameterObject)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a single object instance.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement. Throws: java.sql.SQLException

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 findObjectBySqlMap
参数：
sqlMapId - -The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - -The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
返回：
The single result object populated with the result set data, or null if no result was found

findPaginatedBySqlMap

public PaginationSupport findPaginatedBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                                               java.lang.Object parameterObject,
                                               int offset,
                                               int maxRows)
从接口 PersistenceService 复制的描述
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects within a certain range.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement.

指定者：
接口 PersistenceService<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable> 中的 findPaginatedBySqlMap
参数：
sqlMapId - -The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - -The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
offset - -The number of results to ignore.
maxRows - -The maximum number of results to return.
返回：
A List of result objects.
